TextLibrary.Text: Tauron Flamebite
Stop! Go no further!
Stop! Go no further!
Stop! Go no further!
Stop! Go no further!
And who are YOU to tell me to stop?
And who are YOU to tell me to stop?
And who are YOU to tell me to stop?
And who are YOU to tell me to stop?
I am Tauron Flamebite, Lord of the Firewalkers. This is our Temple. You are unclean, outsider, and you may not enter here.
I am Tauron Flamebite, Lord of the Firewalkers. This is our Temple. You are unclean, outsider, and you may not enter here.
I am Tauron Flamebite, Lord of the Firewalkers. This is our Temple. You are unclean, outsider, and you may not enter here.
I am Tauron Flamebite, Lord of the Firewalkers. This is our Temple. You are unclean, outsider, and you may not enter here.
I have no quarrel with you, Tauron. I'm following a trail that has led me here. I need information.
I have no quarrel with you, Tauron. I'm following a trail that has led me here. I need information.
I have no quarrel with you, Tauron. I'm following a trail that has led me here. I need information.
I have no quarrel with you, Tauron. I'm following a trail that has led me here. I need information.

These are the Realms of War - not the wisest place to be seeking answers. Travel north of here to a place we call the Pike, then return and tell me if you are still willing to follow this trail of yours.
